Overconnectedness

A state that develops when I‚Äôm so well-exposed to the every-day lives of other people that I not only lose my curiosity about their lives, but that I in fact begin to consciously or subconsciously seek to receive less information about them.

Drawbacks

  • Humans begin expecting from one another that they‚Äôre up-to-date on each other‚Äôs feeds
  • Someone commenting on / making jokes about another person‚Äôs late response to a post
  • Perceiving only the highlight reel parts of friends‚Äô lives
